messages.subject: unschooling conferences & intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I m new to the list and need to make a quick intro.  I am Kristin, mom to Chloe (10) and Ryan (8), wife to Mark.  We currently live in Hawaii, but
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,
I'm new to the list and need to make a quick intro. I am Kristin,
mom to Chloe (10) and Ryan (8), wife to Mark. We currently live in
Hawaii, but are hoping to move to Massachusetts by this fall. We
came here from California last summer. I have unschooled there and
gone to the HSC conference in Sacramento many times. It's a great
conference, but kids must stay with the parents at all times, so it
was a bit hard to take kids unless you had two adults.

Anyway, since we are considering a move to New England I have been
very interested in the discussion of a unschooler's conference
there. I had always want to go the GWS conference, but didn't make
it. I do have the old conference brochure and it took place at
Eisner Camp in the Berkshires. Sounds like a fabulous place. I was
wondering if it might be possible to get some conference tips from
the people at Holt Associates. I'm not sure how much of an
organization is left, but I hear that Pat Farenga is still making the
rounds so he may be able to help.

The other thing I just found online is the Unschoolers Network
Conference in New Jersey on June 28th. Linda Dobson will be the
keynote speaker. Here's the link:
http://www.unschooling.org/unnet/conference.htm

This looks like a great list, glad to be here. Kristin
